item.title: Selenium, Firefox and HTTPS pages
item.description: A fairly common scenario that we come across when building automated test suites using Selenium is the need to get past the security exception that Firefox pops up when you try to access a self signed HTTPS page. Luckily there is quite a cool plugin for Firefox called 'Remember Certificate Exception' which automatically clicks through the exception and allows the automated tests to keep running and not get stuck on the certificate exception page.
